modName: Zhang Fei Follower - The Three Kingdoms
summary: Adds Zhang Fei as a follower in The Winking Skeever, Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
Zhang Fei (styled Yide) was the \"Third Brother\" of a group of heroes that formed the Shu Kingdom in the novel \"The Three Kingdoms\", which is based on actual events in ancient China. He was known for his fierce temperament, powerful voice, loyalty and love of wine. You may know him from Dynasty Warriors, The Romance of the Three Kingdoms games, the excellent 6-hour film \"Red Cliff\", and many other retellings of the classic tale including several tv shows and anime.

Zhang Fei can be recruited from The Winking Skeever in Solitude. He starts with an Iron Battleaxe and no armor. He is a 2-Handed fighter and likes heavy armor. He often uses a battle cry (shout) that sends his enemies reeling (Unrelenting Force). He will level with the player character. He does not require any special mods to use, so he should work with whatever mods you like best. He is a big fellow, but not quite as tall as Second Brother Guan Yu.

=========
Changelog:

IMPORTANT NOTE: Take all of his items before changing versions, or you will lose those items!

V1.0: Uses shout \"Unrelenting Force\". Several 2H weapon perks included. I have used a slightly different setup from my Guan Yu mod to reflect their differing personalities (2H axes/polearm axe mods are also favored by Zhang Fei). He does not step lightly, but can use the Avoid Death ability once a day. A few flavor items are his starting inventory. Hunting bow respawn bug has been dealt with.
